website_summaries.verdict: The perfect setup for having a bonnet hair dryer using an existing hair dryer.
pros: Attaches to virtually any normal ionic or ceramic hair dryer
Channels air uniformly over the entire head to provide a  large amount of heat very quickly using the included cap
cons: Bonnet cap can slip off without proper adjusting before use

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bonnet is a nice size. I have long locs (down to lower back) and all my hair fits in bonnet. Even though the size is good, I was surprised at how cheaply made this thing is. Quality is horrible. Upon arrival there were threads hanging that I had to cut off. Upon my third use the bonnet ripped at the seam (see attached photo) ---------------------- Update 07/05/2018 Updated rating to 3 stars due to excellent customer service. I contacted the seller and they responded very quickly. They sent a refund and a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I liked it and it fit my head but my goodness
customer_reviews.text: I liked it and it fit my head but my goodness. The back of my neck was roastin' like a Thanksgiving turkey. The front of my head a bit too. I used the chin strap and put a towel around my neck but then the bonnet shifted causing all types of alignment issues. Overall it's okay but I'd rather have a hood hair dryer that doesn't light my neck up like firecrackers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dries Hair Fast
customer_reviews.text: This is such a must if you have thick hair. If your hair takes too long to blow-dry, then this is the product for you. I also have bought their satin bonnets and they are amazing. What I love about this is that you do not have to go through the struggle of sectioning your hair and individually blow-drying it which takes forever. This hooded dryer gives you a lot more coverage when it comes to drying your hair faster.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Fields-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy This! You Won’t Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: OhMyGosh! I LOVE this bonnet hood! Where have you been all my life?! I simply air dry my hair for a couple of hours OR blow dry 90% then wrap hair sections around large to medium Velcro rollers then slide this bonnet on. Turn the hair dryer on Low Heat for about 15 minutes then Voila! Instant voluminous waves for days!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Five minutes after receiving it in the mail I tried it out and not even 2 minutes of it being on...it burns through. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anchimbom

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this bonnet hood dryer attachment at all. It hugs the head and gets extremely hot and there is no way to avoid feeling like your scalp is being scorched...it was like torture. After one use, I promptly repackaged this item and returned it in exchange for this collapsiblewhich I like very much, and is definitely a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Morans

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this hairdryer. However I cannot rate it five stars because it is not as comfortable as it looks to have on your head. I have to fight with it to get it to stay on once I turn the dryer on. The strap will either choke you or the entire hood normally flies to the back. After a lot of struggle, eventually I have to hold it or keep adjusting. I gave it three stars Because it actually does work but it takes a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: nopenname

customer_reviews.title: Must have !! Perfect for those of us with larger heads :) .
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching high and low for a bonnet hair dryer. I was skeptical about most because my head is big and once I tried to use a friends to dry a flexi rod set and it would not fit over my whole head . So when I saw this XL Bonnet hood dryer I was all over it. I am using it to dry a flexi rod set as I type!! I am very pleased with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Kia Cunegin

customer_reviews.title: Right idea, bad execution
customer_reviews.text: Right idea, bad execution. You cannot move if you have this thing on, will only work correctly if you sit still. The tube that connects the hairdryer to the bonnet will burn you and twists easily. The bonnet also gets very hot. I put it on a lower setting but it will not fully inflate. I returned this item. If you struggle with drying your curly hair without frizzing, I would suggest buying the Deva Curl diffuser, it's the best option I've found other than air drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Obsessed

customer_reviews.title: It's so convenient and love how I can control the heat and use cool ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today to deep condition my natural type 4 hair. It's so convenient and love how I can control the heat and use cool setting as well. Love the adjustment straps and drawstring! Must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: avidbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because based on the description. I thought this would work with my portable hair dryer. It does!!! I have looked so long for a bonnet to replace the cheap plastic bonnet that came w/ my portable hair dryer. I thought I was out of luck until I tried this bonnet. The hose is wide enough and the cap is large enough to accommodate any hair style. Great product! I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion forward

customer_reviews.title: Exactly has it was described
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It came nicely packaged and included a storage bag. Overall storage is good because it’s so compact and so you don’t have to worry about it being too bulky or in the way because it’s collapsible. I used mine for an at-home deep conditioning treatment and it worked great. The easily went over my hair dryer. When I used mine, I put a shower cap to keep my conditioner from being messy with my hood bonnet. I felt the heat just fine. However, it’s not necessary because the bonnet is made out of material that’s easy to clean. Also, I love the color. Overall, I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair drying bonnet!
customer_reviews.text: I have started using hot rollers but just don't have 45 minutes to wait for them to cool. I bought an additional Revlon hot air brush ( and plugged it in at my makeup table and during the time it takes to put on my makeup, my curlers have cooled. It works wonderfully. And my curls hold up so well now that I lightly spray the Oribe Dry Texturizing Spray ( It's a perfect routine that enables me to go several days without having to wash my hair!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lepone

customer_reviews.title: Nifty product
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today so I can’t say too much yet. Just finished a deep conditioning treatment for the past 30 mins. I kept my blow dryer on the low warm setting and switched to cool air every 5 mins or so. I have a big head and it fit my head perfectly, the chin straps and the string around the head help keep it secure and tight. (You control how tight you want it) overall I’m happy with it, will be using it for hot oil treatments as well! Looking forward to getting my hair back in a healthy state.
customer_reviews.author: Hali Mundy

customer_reviews.title: DOH!!! Its Marge!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent buy! Wore it for Halloween, ...Marge Simpson. One problem tho, you need electricity for it to work and puff up so you look like Marge. DOH!!! My friend offered to be an outlet that didn't work....cuz he's got no electricity. So......, it gets pretty hot in there, you can do hot oil treatments while trick or treating....but find a friend who can be wired up for electricity so you can do 2 things at one time! The added perk of being Marge AND having soft shiny hair....PRICELESS!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: A must have for hair care!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It works amazingly to deep condition my hair. My sister also purchased it and uses it to dry her hair at the roots (she wears weaves sometimes so when she showers, she wants to dry her actual hair underneath). What I love most about this product is the convenience. I can move around, sit at my desk or in my bed. Go downstairs or dance. One thing I hated about sitting under a hair dryer is feeling uncomfortable and unable to move for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: California_babe123

customer_reviews.title: Natural hair wash and go made easier
customer_reviews.text: I have African American natural textured hair. I don’t wash daily but I wet daily to redefine curls. This product makes a daily wet and go, work. People can’t believe I do my hair daily, but this product makes that possible. It dries my hair super fast. The first time I used it I had to rewet my hair for more desirable slight dampness to activate my curl, because it dried way faster and sooner than I expected! I had two people I know buy this on my recommendation. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a ton and I dress up when I travel. This is so small and easy to pack and the crazy thing is - it actually works great! I went to the dollar store and got the old style snap on rollers and used on damp hair then placed this device on (crazy looking and all) and it worked! Totally worth the cost and watch out, this thing gets hot! Use lower settings than normal. Bonus, you can walk around and get other things done (like makeup application) while this is doing its magic!
customer_reviews.author: G-I Jane

customer_reviews.title: Powerful  dryer
customer_reviews.text: This works well but was scary the first time. Reason is that when I strapped the item under neck I felt like my head was going to take off with h the cap. In the olden days it was a cap without the neck strap. This may not be well designed due to that problem. Otherwise it has a lot of room for curlers which I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: LIN   LIN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to fit over a full head of Velcro rollers!! Draw string helps keep the hat on. Good quality. Just make sure you keep your dryer on low & alternate between the cool setting, because it gets hot quickly! Has venting holes to let air out. Good price for such a helpful item that helps dry my hair. Happy I don’t have to stand there with my dryer in hand, I rested the dryer on the counter & caught up on emails. :)))
customer_reviews.author: David Theophilus

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soft bonnet and another popular brand (G’n’H). Honestly, this one is definitely better. I really like the chin strap that keeps it from flying off my head. Also, the part that connects over the blow dryer is made to not fly off easy from the strength of the air flow. The bonnet is big enough to accommodate the head-full of curlformers I have, which the other brand was not. I use this as directed on the lowest heat (but not the lowest speed). This is a game changer for me when I am rocking my natural styles since I won’t need to wait all night to get my hair to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Maney

customer_reviews.title: Best 20 bucks spent!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for about 3 months and ive already seen the difference in my hair strength. I use a plastic cap to protect the inside of the bonnet from my hair oils while hot oil treating. This is perfect for limited storage space and traveling. I totally recommend it and the price is reasonable as well
customer_reviews.author: Earnell Vereen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Put the blow dryer in it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work.Put the blow dryer in it and it gets so hot on your ears and temples...impossible to use even at low temperature setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: You have to physically hold it on to keep it from flying off your head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dont like it
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular aluminum hair dryer from Sally's prior to this and it works great just doesn't stay on my head so I bought this. This dryer burns my head (ears neck etc) and I'm using my dryer on low. I have the chin strap on the 2nd to last loop, but it's as if theres no air flow escaping so its extra hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nellemia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about ordering this after reading some of the reviews, but I'm so glad I did. It fit on the end of my blow dryer easily and stays there snugly. The bonnet is nice and big, and went over my curls easily. I got nice curl definition after a few minutes of low heat. This is a must for curly girls- gives you a gentle way of drying fast while keeping the shape of the curl intact. I'm all for air drying in the summer, but this is a very fast way to get curls dry before going out the door. It is nicely made, and looks like it will last a long time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JanieO

customer_reviews.title: It is a good option if you don't have space for a proper ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good option if you don't have space for a proper bonnet dryer and I don't have a microwave to use the heated beaded caps. I like this because I can do my treatment whilst having my hands free. You will have to use your dryer on the lowest settings from preventing the bonnet from trying to fly off your head. It does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this weird little thing. But the string broke after fewer than 10 uses. It's pretty useless without the string since it basically blows off of your head. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anne

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME INVENTION!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Washed my sew in and it was completely dry all the way to yhe scalp in 45mins. And for women who wear sew-in weave you know how important it is to get your hair dry to the scalp. I didn't have to keep holding the dryer! I put my earbuds in, relaxed and watched neflix on my roku. Does slide up a little bit but once you find that perfect spot your hair is dry in no time
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel or sitting on the couch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this product. It's great for people that do not have space for a salon dryer or if just don't feel like sitting under that dryer. This option allows me the ability to move a little more than a salon dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: So it took me a while to finally use this but now that I have... its amazing. I wear hair extensions and most time drying my hair under the extensions is a complete drag so I got this thinking that it could help and it has. Normally drying in sections takes about and an hour or more I’ve been drying for 22 minutes and I’m just about dry. Every few minutes I turn the heat off And just blow air to keep my head and the cap from overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Kitty_CMH

customer_reviews.title: Way better than hard hood dryer; or hand diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have used this once and OMG yes! Just Yes! My curls are way more defined with this dryer. Use with plastic cap for deep condition, use without for drying. Only thing they could improve is the cinching mechanism. It took a while to figure out how it keep it on my head, once it inflated, it started to fly off my head like a balloon. Once I found a good angle for install, it was better. Tips - Put over your ears, if you don't the excess heat escaping will funnel straight to the backs of your ears. Use on med power or it will fly off.
customer_reviews.author: Julisha Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Washing my dreads is fun up until it's time to dry. If it's at the end of the day, I'm inevitably sleeping on a damp head. This is an abaolute miracle. Popped it on and did some work on my computer for 30-45 minutes and afterward they were actually dry! I kept the dryer on the low and warm setting. It got warm (obviously) but was never unbareable. The chin strap could be more comfortable but it was all in all so much better than sleeping on a wet head or holding the dryer to my head for literal hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Anne

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a portable, hooded hair dryer to set velcro curlers. 1 decade later, I found it, turned it on, & smoke poured out through the vents. I ordered this bonnet hood hair dryer attachment as a replacement. I...love...it! Compact & easy to store when not using it, def dries hair well, & more than worth the price. 1 slight difficultly, the heat from the hair dryer is amplified right through the bonnet’s tube. I had to use the low, cool setting on my hair dryer. Felt like my scalp was on fire with the other settings. This doesn’t bother me...it just means I can chill longer as my hair takes a bit longer to dry.
customer_reviews.author: MeckMama

customer_reviews.title: A great money saver!! I’ve got my own salon at home now!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wish I would have known about it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Broke my dryer
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I used this it somehow broke my chi hairdryer. I put the nozzle where it needed to go and went on low heat. And within five minutes there was this smoke smell and my dryer shut off - dead. Had to bury it in my trash can. Was not happy! Keeping the headpiece on is also very difficult. The tip restraint doesn’t keep the head thing in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy D

customer_reviews.title: ONLY USE ON LOW HEAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a love / hate relationship with this product. 1. The string should be way bigger for under the chin it’s very uncomfortable 2. They should add a string for the head part to make it tighter. The air does come out and it does burn my ears / neck after a while Definitely only use low heat i went on high and boy was that a mistake ! It’s definitely big enough for a head full of large rollers it’s 50/50 for me but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it works great! Now I can do conditioning heat treatments on my hair and I don’t have to leave my house! I have noticed some people have complaints on the way that it fits or that it burns their head. I found that putting it on medium heat on low fan works good for me. I did have to shut it off for a little bit to let it cool down but that’s not a big deal. If you’re willing to work with it it will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Falch

customer_reviews.title: All qualities are positive!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer works beautifully. Comfortable, easy to use, no air blowing in my face, plenty of room for the curlers yet stays on even without the use of the chin strap! I use it on warm air/low airflow setting and it's just right - temperature is comfortable, drying is efficient. It also folds up quickly and very small so storage space is a non-issue. I recommend this and would definitely choose it again.
customer_reviews.author: Smilelady

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Bonnet Hood Hair Dryer on Wednesday and got it by Friday which was great. As I write this review I am using the bonnet and I have to say it’s absolutely effective. I roller set my hair and the bonnet is large enough to fit the rollers. I like the fact that this dryer is portable. Just unplug your hair dryer and move to the next room :) overall this bonnet gives me the feel like I’m in the hairdresser and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Valissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me...
customer_reviews.text: The bonnet would not stay on my head unless I used the chin straps. Once I finally got it to stay on, the air still causes the bonnet to fly up. The heat from the blow dryer becomes too hot too handle, and If you turn the setting on cool, its not doing what it's supposed too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: The air flow pulls the strap too strongly, it's very uncomfortable. I bought it to be used on models on set and I can't put them through this. Don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea- but too small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice. One with just my wet hair, another with rollers on. Unfortunately the cap isn’t large enough to accomodate my head with rollers on, which was my original intention for this. When I used it without rollers, the tabs around the chin do pull on you, but I still think the design is effective. I just wish the cap was bigger, or maybe with an elastic to make it stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It works well, I have used it a few ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, I have used it a few times, but my hair does not dry evenly with this. I put it on as in the photo. I guess there’s a learning curve and I have to keep trying different positions.
customer_reviews.author: MaryT

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling..
customer_reviews.text: My hair style is a relaxed short pixie cut and this worked perfectly for my cruise vacation . I took it along with a few travel size hair products and I was able to enjoy the beach, pool, and water slide. It dried my hair evenly in about 20 min. Make sure the handheld dryer you’re using has an “on” button that locks in the on position. The ones on the ship has to be held in on position; which causes you to hold the dryer the whole time. Other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again. Yes, you should buy!
customer_reviews.text: I said it once, I’ll say it again “the best $22 that I ever spent.” I usually hate hooded dryers...but with this one, i am just fine. My ears weren’t hot. Went directly onto my hair. Seems that it even reduces the noice on my Conair hair dryer. This product is awesome. Tonight’s my first night trying it out and i have short hair, i will leave a additional update with drying time and how my hair looks.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted to like it. It did not stay on my head after it was inflated. It got really hot on the high dryer setting. Also, it took a long time for my hair to dry. I was hoping to reduce the hair dry time with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have super thick and curly hair so blow drying can be a pain and even after I think I’m done, my hair still won’t be completely dry until I let it air dry overnight. This is so helpful and dries my hair fully in 15 minutes—tops. It does get a little too warm at times but I just switch my hair dryer to cold for a few minutes and it’s helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this as an alternative to a hard hooded dryer I use it for deep conditioning and drying I hate that one side gets uncomfortably hot very quickly but it be like that with hooded dryers so i just turn it around to ensure even heating. Great quality I love glow by daye products and I’m going to buy another one of her bonnets very soon. SHOP BLACK OWNED! SHOP SMALL BUSINESS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but there are some concerns
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I thought it would be but it does fit my perm rods. I have shoulder length 4a hair. I use it as a quick drying method from home. It does generate a lot of heat on HOT/WARM so I like to keep it on cool setting from the dryer. If you need to dry your hair at a water temp. I would suggest purchasing a towel wrap that goes around the ears, or tuck a tee shirt.
customer_reviews.author: CHELS

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this product. I’ve been looking for a quick way to dry curly hair without a diffuser. This wasn’t the answer. After spending a half an hour with the bonnet on - my hair came out flat and matted down and still wet. I had to keep adjusting the tube around because the heat would get too hot in one spot. It didn’t really distribute the heat. Total waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. I was surprised the packaging was so small when it arrived. No need to buy an expensive hooded dryer. This works better than my hooded dryer because its more easily portable and I don't have to worry about my hood from the dryer falling on my head, which happens all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention. I use this all the time. Works really well. I set the heat on medium and low setting. The fit around my hair dryer works great. I hang up my hair dryer while using so I don’t have to hold it and put my makeup on while my hair is drying. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose S.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Only had it for a few months and the threads on the hose are unraveling leaving holes in the hose. I had to use duct tape to seal it so I can use it. Just today, I discovered another hole in the hose. I store it in the bag that comes with it but it still continues to unravel. If this did not occur, this would have been a great product. Will purchase another one but not by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good idea flimsy product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this bonnet took 12 minutes off my morning routine. The problem is the quality is seriously lacking, with the nylon, very flimsy, it tore right where it joins the hose, in no time at all. I’m holding it together with a binder clip, as best I can.
customer_reviews.author: renee keaney

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Just got done using the Bonnet Hood Hair Dryer from Glow by Daye. This is my first time using a bonnet dryer and, although I had my doubts, I am very satisfied with my purchase. It doesn't heat up as hot as a hood dryer, but I'm only using it for deep conditioning and the amount of heat is fine. My hair was nice and soft after rinsing out the dc. I'll definitely recommend this dryer to others.
customer_reviews.author: Female Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this hooded bonnet dryer attachment
customer_reviews.text: This bonnet is a perfect alternative to an expensive hooded dryer. It also dries my hair in 20-30 minutes on medium heat low air flow. It has amped up my wash n go because I prefer to wash my hair at night to save time in the morning so I’m able to dry my hair and go to bed. I don’t have to wash in the morning and walk around at work all day with flat wet hair. I can get day 2 hair on day 1. I’m also able to dry my hair while I do my makeup if I wash in the morning and I’m able to get the volume I love.
customer_reviews.author: Andria Sherman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star all the way!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer packs a big punch. It is all I need to get the job done. Turn it on and the result is as good as any hair salon dryer but without the bulk. It heats up fast and keeps the selected temperature. It is very easy to take on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: I use this with natural hair and it works really ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with natural hair and it works really well! I was skeptical if it would do well with my texture, but it works really well. I use it with the no heat setting on my blow dryer and generally dry my hour in an hour. This was def worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: drawingstars

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this darn thing...I curl my hair with rollers (believe it or not) and it is indispensable to me. How come I didn’t know it existed before. Fits my hair dryer, and on low, the temp is perfect and dries my hair is record time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use and how little space it takes up. I expect a good year or slightly longer out of it b4 the band around the head gives out. But for about $20 it's a good product. The hood leaks air around my ears but otherwise seems to stay full and warm. I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sundrip Journals

customer_reviews.title: Great way to dry your hair &/or style w/rollers
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Reminded me of the old bonnet-style hair dryer my mom had when we were kids! I’m using it w/a travel hair dryer I have, because I suspect it’s hard on the dryer & don’t want to risk frying my “good” blow dryer. I put it on while I do my makeup (maybe 15-20 min)—although my hair isn’t completely dry by the time I finish, it’s more than halfway there, which helps reduce finishing up styling. Even though I use w/my dryer’s coolest setting, as recommended, I still get a little warm toward the end. Warning: You will look like an alien w/this thing on your head!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy to use dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use it everytime I condition and wrap my hair. Super easy to use and travel with. You can literally roll it up and stick it in a purse. Dries my hair thoroughly with a 25-30min set. Only down side is the tread starts to unravel which is more of an annoyance than an actual problem. It hasn't caused the dryer to come apart, everything is still fully intact. I cut the extra threads with scissors instead of pulling to ensure I don't create any tears or separation.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Put on the hood, snap the button under chin, and pull the steps to tighten around face turn on blowdryer and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Roshelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing dries my hair faster than the dryer at the hair salon. This attachment dries my hair without the traditional breakage that I’ve incurred previously with the comb blow dryer attachment. It took some getting use too but it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but the bonnet blows right off your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but the bonnet blows right off your head. You have to hold it the whole time , even with the chin strap. So, it's not hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've done for myself in ages.
customer_reviews.text: I put my hair in rollers and put this hood on then turn on the dryer and read my book while my hair gets set. It is supper easy and my hair is looking better than ever. AND I am able to get some ME time to read instead of holding the blow dryer and brush to do my hair. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirene J. Urton

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: This actually works really well and helps dry my hair super quick but I have noticed that the fabric is kind of falling apart. Stringy pieces of fabric are starting to make the hood and tube part unravel a bit. It still works, but I’ve only had it for a few months and it’s time to get a new one. I love the concept of the dryer but I think I’ll try another company’s version to see if the fabric doesn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Ellis

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars: Not as fast as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This reduced the drying time of my teenager's medium-texture, past shoulder-length, wavy hair by about 33% (in other words, one-third less time). She says to tell you that her "drying time" is the time it takes to get from dripping wet, to not dripping wet. So, not as fast as she had hoped, but it also provided a way to dry her hair evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Only warms one spot...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but after two tries this cap only appears to warm the back section of the head. I tried this with a deep conditioner and hot oil treatment and it did not come out well due to lack of heat so I had to redo both... Feels like for this product to work you would have to rotate it but that would make a 20 min treatment take 3-4 times longer...
customer_reviews.author: Angela W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking swim lessons in September. Now that fall has fell in NYC It is no longer a good idea to go to bed with wet/damp hair and I didn't want a large hooded dryer because space is an issue. I used it for the first time last night and loved it. Had the dryer on a low setting and my hair was completely dry in no time at all. This will be my Tuesday night routine going forward. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Washngton

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well with a head of heatless wavers for Medium to long hair. A tip is to not have the hair dyer on the heat function. I have a smaller head but it fit well dried hair well and the neck band didn’t choke my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Sydgal

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Kind of awkward to put on and you really have to pull the chin strap on if u dont want it to blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality of heat on the statin product is DANGEROUS on any scalp
customer_reviews.text: Heat is WAY to hot for any sensible person with a scalp. It can’t even properly sit on your head due to the uncomfortable heat, it was truly unbearable. I tried to give it a shot even after reading the horrible reviews and TRUST me they were right, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY AND ESPECIALLY YOUR SENSITIVE SCALP on this heat fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Bintu D.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have damaged bleach blonde hair so I like to do periodic protein treatments. With the protein you have to dry it before you wash it out, and I just put this on and sit down with a good book while it dries. It works perfectly! And it's helping me to transform my hair!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianRay

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Speeds up my drying time and allows ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Speeds up my drying time and allows me to do other things while drying my hair! My hair usually takes 3 hours to dry naturally and this cuts it down to under an hour! Looks silly on, it makes my head look very long, had a good laugh at myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D. Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Loc Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I used it to dry my hair after i retwisted my locs (collar bone length). I used it on the medium setting and my hair dried in about an hour. The hot setting was a little too hot. Overall great product and would recommend as a alternative to the more expensive hooded dryer
customer_reviews.author: M.Russell

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever. I have thick locs and was getting tired of the two day long air dry and impossible task of drying my hair on the go. The bonnet hood is convenient and effective. Although I can't use it on the high setting, I think that means it really concentrates the heat. The size was good and I was able to pile all my locs underneath. Love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine today!!! I was skeptical after reading the comments so I washed my hair as soon as I got home lol. My hair is natural and I love my twist outs so I twisted my hair and attached my blow dryer (my blower dryer is huge so there was a slight struggle getting it to attach but once it was on I didn’t have to worry about it coming off). I set my dryer on high/cool. Didn’t use the chin strap but the draw string on the bonnet is a plus. My hair was dry in 45 minutes, even the back of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Nice solution
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well. It’s easily portable. And it fits snugly. The only drawback had nothing to do with this product. Using my hand held dryer to power this hood, only gave me the two heat options of the dryer. The high setting was way too hot so I had to leave it on cool. Again, this is not the fault of the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than a hard hooded dryer
customer_reviews.text: Before this I used a collapsible hard hooded dryer. It always became top heavy and the slightest bump sent it crashing into your head. It was also very hard to get the right height to fit ypur head under properly. This is so much simpler and convenient. Its very easy to adjust and comfortable. I no longer have to stack up books or slouch down in a chair to fit under the hard hooded dryer. I just put this on, sit down wherever I feel like it and relax. Its made of a strong material that feels durable. Will definitely be ordering another one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: katie sieling

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I hate big hood dryers so I wanted something simple. I love this attachment because it’s super easy to use, all my curls fit In the bonnet, and my hair dries quick. I even can take a nap while my hair is drying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after she said, "We need to get this. Buy a pink one." It came the other day and I asked her when she planned to use it. She said it was for me. She has been telling me I should deep condition my long hair. I used it and wow it really made a difference. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a ziploc bag that was broken... straps didn't work because product has same strap on both sides so it cant be clipped... extremely dissatisfied and disappointed as I waited to try this product and still can't use it and to find out that Amazon doesn't even have any more in stock to issue a replacement.. I guess I wont be able to try it out as I am not going to order again if I have to wait another week. Conveniently I cannot upload pics to show the product
customer_reviews.author: Taneequa

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay on my head when turn on and the strap digs into my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Keyonna

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is perfect, it's perfect for travel and overnight stays. You just attach it to your personal blow dryer and put it on your head, it even has an adjustable strap to secure the hood. No danger of falling off. Turn on the blow dryer and wait for your desired results. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Benton

customer_reviews.title: Received as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift. The only feedback I have is that it arrived quickly and everything that was supposed to be received, was received in the package
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with long hair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of hair!!!! This thing is awesome. My daughter has really long hair and I used it to dry her hair with over 35 very long curl foamers. Everything was able to get in there!! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: ImanWithAnE

customer_reviews.title: Will return & reorder.
customer_reviews.text: While using the first time, one side of the chin strap came out. It doesn't seem like it was sewn on! I will return and reorder. I love the idea, but it's impossible to use without the chin strap- otherwise it lifts off when you turn on the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jackie Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. I have medium/long hair. I wear mostly protective styles like Bantu knots, flat twists, rods etc. I used this with my poem rod set. It took a minute for me to get it positioned so that it didn't burn my ears or my neck. When I finally got it setup, I stayed under the dryer for about two hours. My hair was mostly dried. I tried it on the hot setting and it burned my scalp immediately, so I could only use my dryer on medium heat. It fit my dryer with no issues. Also great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Best Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets extremely hot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the item the bonnet is larger enough to go over a head full of flexi rods. It just gets way too hot,I have to go between low and cool air like ever 3-4mins. I've put a bonnet on under a shower cap under like some of the reviews but it still gets too hot. It takes a little longer to dry but for the amount it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kortnie

customer_reviews.title: Was good except for the size, extra large is small.
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and I use the purple roller to stretch my hair a bit. This bonnet is great with hand dryer. My only concern is for the size. I thought I bought the small size with out noticing. But it was extra large. I still have issue with the size. I was planning to use what I have for hair steam and buy another big one. I don’t know what size is bigger than extra large.
customer_reviews.author: shewa

customer_reviews.title: As I opened the package the bonnet itself was constructed too and was large enough to fit rollers or flexirods all inside especially that I love to wear hair extensions I can't wait to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Package came shipped on time no damages. As I opened the package the bonnet itself was constructed too and was large enough to fit rollers or flexirods all inside especially that I love to wear hair extensions I can't wait to use it and it can travel with me where ever I go. That's a plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO USE AND COMFORTABLE FIT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! I love how big the cap is since I have a big head. It even actually came over my eyes so I moved it above my ears and used the tightener on the side. The hose fit the spout of my blow dryer just fine. This product is just so comfortable to use really helped my deep conditioning process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Braids, Weaves, Hair, whatever this is cool
customer_reviews.text: It's only 4/5 stars because even when you secure the button and drawstring, it still moves. It gets 3/4 of my hair dry in braids, and without. This only works if you have the long traditional blow dryer, not the hand-held one that I had. It works well for on the go kind of. I'm still glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Co

customer_reviews.title: Stays on my head and my blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of these and always found them incredibly annoying. This is the only one I have ever had that stays on my blow dryer and on my head. It dries my hair effectively. That’s all I ever needed from it, so I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have locs that have gotten quite long, and it takes hours and lots of manuevering to dry under the hood dryer. With this, I can fit all my hair under the bonnet and it dries in half the time. Works best on the low hand dryer setting because it gets very hot on the high setting and burns my scalp. I was sold after one use. Would defimitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kitties

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It fits on any normal hair dryer, I have a full size and compact Revlon and it fits both. I wish the tube was just a tiny bit longer, and it sure does make your neck hot, but it works and is fully adjustable so it'll fit anyone. I can use it with curlers and I use it for blow outs.
customer_reviews.author: Larah Seach

customer_reviews.title: Works as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This works just as I’d hoped. It stays on my blow dryer and on my head and is not uncomfortable. It’s not the same as having a full size hair bonnet dryer but I like that it doesn’t take up much space and it costs much less too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Woke up to a message this morning that it was here frist thing I did even before eating breakfast was get open and use it for the frist time and girl am I glad I did one of the best this I've bought in such a long time....and it fits everyone even us with big heads lol but frfr great product especially for travelers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tyhie G.

product_meta.title: Bonnet Hood Hair Dryer Attachment- Soft, Adjustable Extra Large Hooded Bonnet for Hand Held Hair Dryer with Stretchable Grip and Extended Hose Length (Navy)
feature_bullets: FREE GIFT OFFER with every bonnet! Large Bonnet Size to Hold Almost Any Hairstyle Including Rollers- 9 Inches Long, 15 inches wide, 40 inches hose for mobility, 9 inch perimeter hose width
Adjustable Drawstring and Chin strap to ensure cap stays In Place during Drying Session
Consistent and strategically place hole opening for Even, Robust airflow and distribution
Hold grip and stretchable hose collar to fit almost any size hand held dryer
Storage Bag included to store neatly until the next use and/or traveling

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
